basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Fakhrildeen "Al" Albahadily Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Chemistry. Eligibility Requirements Full-time undergraduate or graduate student Minimum 3.0 GPA Major in Chemistry Must be sophomore, junior or senior status Preference will be given to students who are interested in attending graduate school for Chemistry
